elements.text: Today, your reliable son doesn't show up and tells you that he's sick. You later see him post a photo on social media of himself at a mini golf course. Thinking about confronting him leads to you lashing out at those around you and getting very...

elements.name: Social Media Post_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
